title: Why is he banned?
body:
My friend tried to login like 15 minutes ago and He got that message, He dont really know why..so He need some help.Also that second picture is when He tried to press LOGIN button in the top corner...Why is he banned?That's his question,or is he banned?
And if yes why?{{champion:203}} {{summoner:32}} 

Pictrue where of his client - http://prntscr.com/bvr2w8
Picture from site (trying to log in) - http://prntscr.com/bvr3f6

replies.body: It looks like your friend is having some issues establishing a connection to our servers.  Please ask him to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our tech team, who will be best fit to address this for him.  Please be sure that he is submitting is a ticket, as we'll only communicate with the account owner.
